import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import UserDrawerComponent from "../../components/UserDrawerComponent"; import { gql, useMutation } from "apollo-server-express"; const CREATE_PLAYLIST = gql` mutation CreatePlaylist($name: String!, $description: String!, $user: ID!) { createPlaylist(name: $name, description: $description, user: $user) { name description } } `; export default function CreatePlaylists() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", description: "", user: "" }) const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })) } return (
); }
